column4: guys, can any one any one give me some techy attention, feeling neglected here... :(

and i am trying to make a dial up connection through an adsl modem, but the usb modem is not recognised as i am connecting it, and when i am trying to add a dial up connection there is no modem to choose from
imight have the driver in, when i plug the modem to the usb port the lights dont even light up
does it show up in dmesg or lsusb ????
can u guide me on what to do to list it
how do i lu=ook , rug(i should have mentioned , am ok
rug, it list as device 004 id 0572:cb00
it has a LED on it , that usualy flashes( on a windows pc, if its connected yet b4 it is installed)
not just yet, i just thought that as the LED does not even blink, the usb might not have powered it up yet
if it is showing up in lsusb, then the OS has detected it.
